amendment.description: Amendment sought to remove all accountability provisions from the bill by striking sections 2 through 8 and section 10.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walz amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 250 (Roll no. 511).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Walz amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 250 (Roll no. 511).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Walz.
